FuncDef:
The l2tpv3 enable command enables L2TPv3.
The undo l2tpv3 enable command disables L2TPv3.
By default, L2TPv3 is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
L2TPv3 is an IP-based high-performance tunneling technology. L2TPv3 is used to transparently transmit Layer 2 traffic between CEs over a PSN.
Precautions
All information about the L2TPv3 will be deleted if L2TPv3 is disabled.
